title: Replace Dashboard with Knowledge Board for Hospital Licenses

requirements.summary: Create KnowledgeBoard page component displaying comprehensive hospital license and regulatory information
acceptanceCriteria: KnowledgeBoard.tsx component exists at frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBoard.tsx
Component displays hero section explaining hospital licensing information
Content is sourced from or references https://www.researchgate.net/publication/398379014_LICENCE_REQUIRED_FOR_HOSPITALS
Page follows the existing McKinsey-inspired professional design theme

file_operations.description: Create KnowledgeBoard page component with hero section featuring generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hospital-licenses-hero.dim_1920x1080.png. Include introduction explaining hospital licensing importance with reference to the ResearchGate publication. Structure the page with professional typography and enterprise color scheme matching existing pages. Use card-based layout for organizing license information sections.

requirements.summary: Display hospital license types and categories with classifications, regulatory bodies, and compliance requirements
acceptanceCriteria: Knowledge Board displays organized sections covering license types
Content references the ResearchGate publication on hospital licenses
Information is structured with clear headings and bullet points
Sections are visually organized with cards or expandable panels

file_operations.description: Add license types section with cards displaying different hospital license classifications (Clinical Establishments Act, State Medical Council registrations, AERB for radiation facilities). Include regulatory bodies information (State Health Departments, Medical Council of India, Drug Controller). Use generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/compliance-standards.dim_800x600.png to illustrate compliance standards. Structure content with clear headings, bullet points, and organized card layout for easy scanning.

requirements.summary: Display regulatory compliance requirements covering registration, accreditation standards, and legal obligations
acceptanceCriteria: Regulatory compliance section is visible on Knowledge Board
Content covers registration processes and accreditation standards
Legal obligations and requirements are clearly outlined
Information is presented in a scannable, easy-to-read format

file_operations.description: Add regulatory compliance section featuring hospital registration processes, NABH (National Accreditation Board for Hospitals) and ISO accreditation standards, and legal obligations under Clinical Establishments Act. Include generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/licensing-process.dim_1200x800.png to visualize the licensing process flowchart. Present information in expandable accordion panels or card grids with clear headings, bullet lists, and scannable formatting for quick reference.

requirements.summary: Update route configuration to replace '/dashboard' with '/knowledge-board' route
acceptanceCriteria: Route '/knowledge-board' exists in frontend/src/App.tsx
Route renders KnowledgeBoard page component within Layout wrapper
Previous '/dashboard' route is removed or replaced
Route is accessible to authenticated users

file_operations.description: Replace the existing '/dashboard' route with '/knowledge-board' route that renders the KnowledgeBoard component wrapped in Layout. Import KnowledgeBoard from './pages/KnowledgeBoard'. Ensure route follows the same authentication and layout pattern as other authenticated pages. Remove or replace the Dashboard route registration to avoid conflicts.

requirements.summary: Update Navigation component to replace 'Dashboard' link with 'Knowledge Board' link
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation displays 'Knowledge Board' link instead of 'Dashboard'
Link routes to '/knowledge-board' path
Link is conditionally displayed based on authentication state
Active route highlighting works for Knowledge Board link

file_operations.description: Replace the 'Dashboard' navigation link with 'Knowledge Board' link that routes to '/knowledge-board'. Update both desktop and mobile navigation menus. Ensure the link maintains conditional rendering based on authentication state using the existing isAuthenticated check. Verify active route highlighting works correctly for the '/knowledge-board' path using the existing active link logic.

requirements.summary: Apply existing enterprise design theme to Knowledge Board ensuring visual consistency
acceptanceCriteria: Knowledge Board uses consistent color scheme with rest of site
Typography matches enterprise design standards
Spacing and layout follow existing design patterns
Page is fully responsive on mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Apply enterprise design theme using existing Tailwind classes and CSS variables from frontend/src/index.css. Use white backgrounds, deep blue text (text-[#003366]), and the enterprise color palette. Match typography patterns from other pages using existing heading classes (text-4xl, text-2xl, font-bold). Ensure consistent spacing with existing pages using standard Tailwind spacing utilities (p-6, py-12, space-y-8). Implement responsive design with mobile-first approach using sm:, md:, lg: breakpoints matching existing responsive patterns across the site.

requirements.summary: Add multiple CTAs encouraging demo bookings strategically placed throughout Knowledge Board
acceptanceCriteria: At least three CTAs are present on Knowledge Board page
CTAs are strategically placed (top, middle, bottom)
All CTAs encourage demo booking or consultation
CTAs follow existing button styling and interaction patterns

file_operations.description: Add three CTAs for demo booking: one in the hero section below the title, one mid-page after the license types section, and one at the bottom before the footer. Use the existing DemoBookingForm component pattern from other pages. Style CTAs with consistent button classes matching existing CTA buttons across the site (bg-[#008B8B], hover effects, rounded styling). Include compelling copy encouraging hospitals to book demos or consultations about compliance and licensing support.
